user_question: What is the process I should follow, to satisfy the ACT planning and transfer my crown lease by selling.

similar_questions.question: Hi All I settled on a land in ACT in 2023 Previously signed a building contract and the contract has expired in 2022 I barely managed to settle on the land and Im in no state financially to build on the block Due to the rise of interest rates I cannot afford and hence Im planning to sell the land What is the process I should follow to satisfy the ACT planning and transfer my crown lease by selling The Information available on the websites is confusing so please provide suggestions Thanks

Hi I am planning to place my vacant land for sale in ACT due to financial impracticability to build I couldnt find proper guidance towards land sale on the web Got the financial assessment letter ready from the accountant to support the ministerial consent to transfer the lease I have a buyer who is interested and confirmed they have the eligibility to build on the block Before I agree to the seller would like to get some opinion and understand the timeframes towards the settlement so I can plan for the next And proceed with the solicitor as next step My understanding is to apply for Minister consent to transfer the lease in ACT via solicitor How quick is to get the Minister Consent How long does it generally take to transfer lease to the buyer once the contract is signed and any additional steps would be involved towards the settlement Thanks Vin
How to sell your house in Australia Please tell me the basic steps
